question: The subject allocation to the Department of Higher Education is included in the which schedule of the Govt. of India (Allocation of Business) Rules, 1961?
explanation: The 2nd schedule of the Govt. of India (Allocation of Business) Rules, 1961 lists out the allocations to Department of Higher Education through various subject allocations. Some of the allocations to Department of Higher Education are educational research, National Book Trust, Admission of Foreign students in Indian colleges, etc.
